title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: When using the New Package Wizard in the Java Project, there is a confusing message.
OB: When I create a new Java project and select the project, I encounter a confusing message while using the New Package Wizard.
EB: The message in the New Package Wizard should provide clear instructions or information that is not confusing to the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java Project. 
2. Select the created project. 
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
